symptom_description: Diarrhea is the passage of loose, watery stools and can be caused by infections, food poisoning, or gastrointestinal disorders.

doctor_conversations.prompt: How frequently are you experiencing diarrhea?
patient_responses: I've had diarrhea multiple times today.
It's been ongoing for a few days now.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Have you tried any over-the-counter remedies?
patient_responses: I haven't tried anything yet.
I used an over-the-counter medication, but it didn't help much.

doctor_conversations.prompt: You should stay hydrated and consider seeing a healthcare professional if it persists.
patient_responses: I'll make sure to drink plenty of fluids.
I'll consult a doctor if it doesn't improve.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Are you experiencing any abdominal cramps or bloating along with diarrhea?
patient_responses: Yes, I've been having cramps and bloating.
No, I don't have any abdominal discomfort.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Do you have a history of gastrointestinal disorders?
patient_responses: I have irritable bowel syndrome (IBS).
No, I don't have any known gastrointestinal issues.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Have you made any significant changes to your diet recently?
patient_responses: I started a new diet last week.
My diet has remained the same.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Have you been experiencing any vomiting or nausea?
patient_responses: Yes, I've been vomiting as well.
No, I haven't experienced any nausea or vomiting.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Have you recently had any food from a questionable source, such as street food or undercooked meat?
patient_responses: I ate street food a few days ago.
I've been eating home-cooked meals.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Are you currently taking any other medications or supplements?
patient_responses: I'm taking a daily multivitamin and an allergy medication.
I'm not on any other medications or supplements.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Have you had any recent travel to regions known for gastrointestinal infections?
patient_responses: I traveled to a tropical country last month.
No, I haven't traveled to such regions recently.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Do you have a history of food allergies?
patient_responses: I'm allergic to shellfish and had some a few days ago.
I don't have any food allergies.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Are you experiencing any fatigue or weakness along with diarrhea?
patient_responses: Yes, I've been feeling extremely fatigued.
No, I don't feel particularly weak.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Have you been in contact with anyone who has recently traveled and had similar symptoms?
patient_responses: My coworker just returned from a trip and also has diarrhea.
No, I haven't been in contact with anyone like that.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Have you noticed any changes in the color or odor of your stool?
patient_responses: Yes, it's been very foul-smelling and dark in color.
No, my stool looks normal.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Are you experiencing any fever or chills?
patient_responses: Yes, I have a fever and chills.
No, I don't have a fever or chills.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Have you recently consumed any raw or undercooked eggs or dairy products?
patient_responses: I had a raw egg in a sauce a few days ago.
I haven't consumed any raw or undercooked products.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Do you have a history of lactose intolerance?
patient_responses: Yes, I'm lactose intolerant and had dairy last night.
No, I'm not lactose intolerant.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Have you traveled to areas with poor sanitation or water quality recently?
patient_responses: I visited a rural area with questionable water quality last week.
No, I haven't traveled to such areas recently.

doctor_conversations.prompt: Have you experienced any recent stress or emotional changes?
patient_responses: I've been under a lot of stress lately.
No, my stress levels have been normal.

doctor_conversations.prompt: ENDED
patient_responses: Please Restart the App !
